about_the_game:
Deadvale is a top-down action RPG set in a foreboding dungeon where your character has no inventory - and you may use only what you can carry in your two hands. Search for weapons and equipment, survive hand-to-hand combat with dangerous enemies, explore an interactive, physics-based environment, and discover powerful foes in your journey to escape the forsaken place in which you now find yourself trapped.

Key Features

  • Hand-to-hand, reaction based combat

  • Interactive, physics-based environment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
